name: #32 Support double click
body:
#32 
Start to support double click event.

name: 4 new adapter helper classes.
body:
4 new adapter helper classes:
- [BaseSwipeAdapter](https://github.com/daimajia/AndroidSwipeLayout/blob/master/library/src/main/java/com/daimajia/swipe/adapters/BaseSwipeAdapter.java)
- [ArraySwipeAdapter](https://github.com/daimajia/AndroidSwipeLayout/blob/master/library/src/main/java/com/daimajia/swipe/adapters/ArraySwipeAdapter.java)
- [CursorSwipeAdapter](https://github.com/daimajia/AndroidSwipeLayout/blob/master/library/src/main/java/com/daimajia/swipe/adapters/CursorSwipeAdapter.java)
- [SimpleCursorSwipeAdapter](https://github.com/daimajia/AndroidSwipeLayout/blob/master/library/src/main/java/com/daimajia/swipe/adapters/SimpleCursorSwipeAdapter.java)

Please visit [Wiki](https://github.com/daimajia/AndroidSwipeLayout/wiki) to know more about the usage.

#24 
Fix:
`setEnabled(boolean)` not work.

New:
`setSwipeEnabled(boolean)`, enable or disable the swipe gesture.

#12 Adding methods to programmatically open or close items in the list
#9 #10 Adding ability to solve complicate situation.

name: Support 2 kind of sliding mode in ListView, GridView.
